title: Shattered Relics League/Tasks/Magic
content:
Name Task Requirements Comp%
Beginner
Cast Home Teleport Cast the Home Teleport spell. N/A 95%
Easy
Equip a Wizard Robe and Hat Equip any wizard robe along with any wizard hat. N/A 66%
Equip an Elemental Staff Equip a basic elemental staff. N/A 89%
Medium
Equip a Piece of a Mystic Set Equip any piece of any Mystic robe set. 40 Magic, 20 Defence 65%
Teleport Using Law Runes Cast any teleport spell that uses Law Runes. 25 Magic 81%
Equip an Elemental Battlestaff or Mystic Staff Equip either an elemental battlestaff or an elemental mystic staff. 30 Magic, 30 53%
Cast a Blast Spell Cast any blast spell. 41 Magic 75%
Cast High Level Alchemy Cast the High Level Alchemy spell. 55 Magic 76%
Cast Ice Rush Cast the Ice Rush spell. 58 Magic
Completion of Desert Treasure 		54%
Equip a God Cape Equip either a Saradomin cape, a Guthix cape or Zamorak cape. 60 Magic 52%
Cast Saradomin Strike Cast the Saradomin Strike spell outside of the Mage Arena. 60 Magic
Completion of Mage Arena I miniquest 		38%
Cast Claws of Guthix Cast the Claws of Guthix spell outside of the Mage Arena. 60 Magic
Completion of Mage Arena I miniquest 		38%
Cast Flames of Zamorak Cast the Flames of Zamorak spell outside of the Mage Arena. 60 Magic
Completion of Mage Arena I miniquest 		38%
Cast Resurrect Superior Ghost Resurrect a ghost by using the Resurrect Superior Ghost spell. 57 Magic
Requires completion of A Kingdom Divided 		34%
Inferior Demonbane Demon Kill Kill a demon using the Inferior Demonbane spell. 44 Magic 34%
Hard
Cast Resurrect Crops Cast the spell Resurrect Crops from the Arceuus spellbook.
Note: The spell must succeed in resurrecting a crop. 		78 Magic
60% Arceuus favour 		34%
Equip a Dust Battlestaff Obtain and equip a Dust battlestaff. 30 Attack, 30 Magic 22%
Equip a Mist Battlestaff Obtain and equip a Mist battlestaff. 30 Attack, 30 Magic 16%
Cast Kourend Castle Teleport Cast the spell Kourend Castle Teleport after unlocking it by reading transportation incantations. 69 Magic 43%
Equip a Combination Battlestaff or Mystic Staff Equip either a combination battlestaff or a combination mystic staff. 30 Magic, 30 Attack 41%
Cast a Wave Spell Cast any wave spell. 62 Magic 64%
Cast a Surge Spell Cast any surge spell. 81 Magic
Can be completed as Attacker in Barbarian Assault.
Otherwise requires completion of Dragon Slayer II for Wrath runes or access to the Fountain of Rune and another player to cast on. 		25%
Equip Bryophyta's Staff Equip Bryophyta's staff. 30 Attack, 30 Magic 3.2%
Switch to the Lunar Spellbook Switch to the Lunar spellbook. N/A 57%
Cast Moonclan Teleport Cast the Moonclan Teleport spell. 69 Magic
Lunar Diplomacy 		50%
Cast Fertile Soil Cast the Fertile Soil spell. 83 Magic 37%
Equip a Mud Battlestaff Equip a mud battlestaff. 30 Magic, 30 Attack 12%
Cast Ice Burst Cast the Ice Burst spell. 70 Magic
Completion of Desert Treasure 		55%
Cast Ice Blitz Cast the Ice Blitz spell. 82 Magic
Completion of Desert Treasure 		48%
Cast Smoke Barrage Cast the Smoke Barrage spell. 86 Magic
Completion of Desert Treasure 		45%
Cast Shadow Barrage Cast the Shadow Barrage spell. 88 Magic
Completion of Desert Treasure 		44%
Equip a Piece of the Infinity Robe Set Equip any piece of the Infinity robe set. 50 Magic, 25 Defence 12%
Cast Paddewwa Teleport Cast the Paddewwa Teleport spell. 54 Magic
Completion of Desert Treasure 		52%
Imbue a God Cape Imbue either a Saradomin cape, a Guthix cape or Zamorak cape. Completion of Mage Arena II miniquest 32%
Equip a Piece of the Dagon'Hai Set Equip any piece of the Dagon'hai robes set. 70 Magic, 40 Defence 12%
Cast Degrime Spell Full Clean Clean 26 herbs using the Degrime spell. 70 Magic
Requires completion of A Kingdom Divided 		35%
Elite
Reach Level 99 Magic Reach level 99 in your Magic skill. 99 Magic 35%
Obtain 25 Million Magic XP Obtain 25 million experience in your Magic skill. 99 Magic 16%
Cast Spellbook Swap Cast the Spellbook Swap spell. 96 Magic 33%
Create a Catherby Teleport Tablet Create a Catherby Teleport Tablet. 87 Magic 27%
Cast Blood Barrage Cast the Blood Barrage spell. 92 Magic
Completion of Desert Treasure 		43%
Cast Ice Barrage Cast the Ice Barrage spell. 94 Magic
Completion of Desert Treasure 		42%
Equip a Full Infinity Robe Set Equip a full set of Infinity robes. 50 Magic, 25 Defence 1.1%
Equip a Master Wand Equip a Master wand. 60 Magic 5.6%
Equip a Mage's Book Equip a Mage's book. 60 Magic 2.9%
Equip a Sanguinesti Staff Equip a Sanguinesti staff. 75 Magic 2.8%
Equip a Full Dagon'Hai Set Equip a full set of Dagon'hai robes. 70 Magic, 40 Defence 3.5%
Craft a Ghorrock Teleport Tablet Craft a Ghorrock Teleport Tablet. 96
Completion of Desert Treasure 		23%
Cast Full Sinister Offering Offer 3 bones in your inventory using the Sinister Offering spell. 92 Magic
Requires completion of A Kingdom Divided 		22%
